name: Julie
hero_1: Creative and proactive, I have more than three years of experience in web development (Vue.JS & Laravel), UI/UX design, and a double expertise in web marketing. üë©üèª‚Äçüíª
hero_2: My goal is to provide the best user experience by designing and developing intuitive and performant interfaces with a suitable design that respects the brand's identity. üéØ

skills.description_1: I started my career in web marketing and community management, which allowed me to put my creativity to work and learn how to make effective acquisition and retention strategies.
skills.description_2: I decided to switch to web development to acquire the technical skills to more concretely design the ideas that abound in my head.
skills.description_3: Curious and enriched by my various professional skills, I am a full-stack developer with a particular appetite for UI/UX. I enjoy creating mockups and wireframes and developing attractive, performant and intuitive websites.

experiences.description_1: I'm a full-stack developer but I previously worked in community management and web-marketing.
experiences.description_2: Spontaneous and multi-skilled, I am committed to using my various skills.
experiences.description_3: I like to challenge the existing and imagine the future. üöÄ

jobs.kizeo_name: Web developer (Vue.Js & Laravel) - Specialized in front-end & UX/UI solutions
jobs.kizeo_description: Kizeo is an international SAS (simplified joint-stock company) created in France in 2011 and specialized in the edition of application software. In other words, our core business is to develop IT solutions for professionals in the form of mobile applications and softwares.
jobs.kizeo_duties_1: ‚Ä¢ Development of Kizeo web sites (Kizeo Forms & Kizeo Corp) in Vue.js and Laravel
jobs.kizeo_duties_2: ‚Ä¢ Evaluate and improve the existing UX/UI design of Kizeo solutions (Kizeo Forms, Kizeo Corp & Tempo by Kizeo)
jobs.kizeo_duties_4: ‚Ä¢ Gather and evaluate user needs in collaboration with Product Owners and Marketing department
jobs.kizeo_duties_5: ‚Ä¢ Maintain internal/external technical documentation (Notion, Kizeo Forms Documentation, Swagger API & Kizeo Forms Documentation)
jobs.kizeo_duties_6: ‚Ä¢ Participate in advanced internal/external advanced support and development of new work processes on JIRA for support tracking
jobs.kizeo_duties_7: ‚Ä¢ Participate in the execution and development of unit tests
jobs.simplelif_description: Simple Lif' is a start-up that develops a collaborative tool to facilitate the daily life of independent nurses.
jobs.simplelif_duties_1: ‚Ä¢ Creation of features for the Bonami mobile application in React Native
jobs.simplelif_duties_2: ‚Ä¢ Design and implementation of the back-office registration pages
jobs.office_duties_1: ‚Ä¢ Participation in the definition and implementation of the office's digital strategy by developing its presence on social media and the web
jobs.office_duties_2: ‚Ä¢ Animation and community management on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter in order to build loyalty, involve and federate the various targets for the promotion of the city
jobs.office_duties_3: ‚Ä¢ Creation and integration of contents (news, photos, videos) on the social medias, the website and the mobile app
jobs.office_duties_4: ‚Ä¢ Update the database of the tourist departmental platform (PATIO visitprovence)
jobs.office_duties_5: ‚Ä¢ Diffusion and promotion of a video campaign via AdWords (TrueView InStream)
jobs.office_duties_6: ‚Ä¢ Creation and diffusion of a weekly newsletter (Mailchimp)
jobs.office_duties_7: ‚Ä¢ Creation of flyers, logos and posters
jobs.office_duties_8: ‚Ä¢ English translation of tour guides and flyers
jobs.neko_duties_2: ‚Ä¢ Creation of contents (logo, facebook cover, promotional visuals)
jobs.digitick_description: French leading on-line ticketing company, Digitick is part of Vivendi group.
jobs.digitick_duties_1: ‚Ä¢ Emailing : creation of weekly and monthly email marketing campaigns on Mailchimp; management of the workflow & email production calendar in collaboration with the commercial team; optimization of the email templates (HTML); improvement of the customers segmentation according to their tastes and previous purchases; creation of weekly reports and recommendations based on obtained results
jobs.digitick_duties_2: ‚Ä¢ Management and supervision of Pay Per Click advertising campaigns : SEM, affiliate, display and Facebook Ads campaigns
jobs.digitick_duties_3: ‚Ä¢ SEO : creation of meta contents for the (then) future version of Digitick.com
jobs.digitick_duties_4: ‚Ä¢ Affiliation: creation of partnerships and assistance in managing the communication schedule regarding the display campaigns
jobs.digitick_duties_5: ‚Ä¢ Google Analytics : supervision of the campaigns; creation of weekly and monthly reports about the results of the acquisition funnels of Digitick.com, zePass, Infoconcert and main white label websites

education.description_1: I obtained a bachelor's degree in a multidisciplinary program to improve my knowledge in economics, law and marketing while strengthening my language skills in english and starting to learn japanese.
education.description_2: Attracted by digital technology, I completed a master's degree in digital communication and, after some professional experiences, I decided to follow a training in web development.

formations.dev_name: Professional certification (RNCP level 5) in Web Development
formations.lea_name: Bachelors's Degree in Applied Foreign Languages (english and japanese)

footer.contact_me: Feel free to contact me on

about_me_1: Who am I? Professionally, if I refer to the results obtained during my skills assessment by the Executive Profiler research and training center, my talent established by prismatic intelligence is the Epicurean (ECSX), a profile that likes to live intensively in the present moment, to work in a group with active people and who has confidence in its ability to find appropriate solutions when the time comes.
about_me_2: I am a spontaneous, intuitive person who learns in the action and who exercises my creativity through concrete achievements.
about_me_3: Outside of work, I am passionate about music which I listen to tirelessly every day, I also play the guitar and am always up for a musical blind-test.
about_me_4: I have also been a fan of video games since my first console and I like to discover new films and TV series.
about_me_5: Finally, I am a fervent supporter of Olympique de Marseille whose motto 'Straight to the goal' corresponds perfectly to my personality.
